trans-unit.source: Possibly this is an old Bloom Pack created before Bloom Packs could handle special characters in file names. You may be able to get the author to re-create it using a current version. If that's not possible a technical expert may be able to repair things.
trans-unit.target: Esta es posiblemente una antigua BloomPack creado antes de que BloomPacks pudieran manejar caracteres especiales en los nombres de los archivos. El autor de la BloomPack puede ser capaz de volver a crearlo utilizando la versión actual. Si eso no es posible, un experto técnico puede ser capaz de reparar el BloomPack.

trans-unit.source: The {0} Collection is now ready to use on this computer.
trans-unit.target: La colección {0} está lista para su uso en este computadora.

trans-unit.note: Displayed as the message box title

trans-unit.source: This BloomPack appears to be incomplete or corrupt.
trans-unit.target: This BloomPack appears to be incomplete or corrupt.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to install that Bloom Pack
trans-unit.target: Bloom no pudo instalar ese BloomPack

trans-unit.note: Shown while Bloom Packs are being installed

trans-unit.source: Bloom is already running, but the contents will not show up until the next time you run Bloom
trans-unit.target: Bloom ya se está ejecutando, pero no se mostrará los contenidos hasta la próxima vez que ejecute Bloom

trans-unit.source: The Bloom collection will not be installed.
trans-unit.target: No se instalará la colección Bloom.

trans-unit.source: This computer already has a Bloom collection named '{0}'. Do you want to replace it with the one from this Bloom Pack?
trans-unit.target: Esta computadora ya tiene una colección Bloom llamado '{0}'. ¿Desea reemplazarlo por el de esta BloomPack?

trans-unit.source: Bloom Packs should have only a single collection folder at the top level of the .ZIP file.
trans-unit.target: BloomPacks deben tener sólo una carpeta de colección en el nivel superior del archivo zip.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to remove the existing copy of '{0}'. Quit Bloom if it is running & try again. Otherwise, try again after restarting your computer.
trans-unit.target: Bloom no pudo eliminar la copia existente de '{0}'. Salga de Bloom si se está ejecutando y vuelva a intentarlo. De lo contrario, vuelva a intentarlo después de reiniciar la computadora.

trans-unit.source: To select, use your mouse wheel or point at what you want, then release the key.
trans-unit.note: When you hold down a key, a popup appears that lets you choose a related character. These instructions are shown in that popup.
trans-unit.target: Para seleccionar, utilice la rueda del ratón o apunte en lo que quieres, luego suelte la tecla.

trans-unit.source: This formatting is the default for all text boxes with '{0}' style.
trans-unit.target: Este formato es el predeterminado para todos los cuadros de texto con el estilo '{0}'

trans-unit.source: This formatting is for all text boxes with '{0}' style.
trans-unit.target: Este formato es para todos los cuadros de texto con el estilo '{0}'

trans-unit.source: This formatting is for all {0} text boxes with '{1}' style.
trans-unit.target: Este formato es para todo texto {0} en cuadros con estilo '{1}'

trans-unit.source: Sorry, Reader Templates do not allow changes to formatting.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, plantillas de lectores no permiten cambios en el formato.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem reading this book and recovered by restoring a recent backup. Please check recent changes to this book. If this happens for no obvious reason, please click Details below and report it to us.
trans-unit.target: Bloom had a problem reading this book and recovered by restoring a recent backup. Please check recent changes to this book. If this happens for no obvious reason, please click Details below and report it to us.

trans-unit.source: It appears that some part of the folder path to this book has been moved or renamed. As a result, Bloom cannot save your changes to this page, and will need to exit now. If you haven't been renaming or moving things, please click Details below and report the problem to the developers.
trans-unit.target: Parece que alguna parte de la ruta de la carpeta de este libro se ha movido o cambiado de nombre. Como resultado, Bloom no puede guardar los cambios en esta página, y tendrá que salir ahora. Si usted no ha estado cambiando el nombre o moviendo las cosas, por favor haga clic en Detalles de abajo y reportar el problema a los programadores.

trans-unit.source: Open Page in Firefox (which must be in the PATH environment variable)
trans-unit.target: Open Page in Firefox (which must be in the PATH environment variable)

trans-unit.source: Show Experimental Commands (e.g. Export XML for InDesign)
trans-unit.target: Mostrar los comandos experimentales (e.g. exportar XML para InDesign)
Mostrar las plantillas experimentales (e.g. Diccionario del cuadro, calendario)

trans-unit.source: Use Image Server to reduce memory usage with large images.
trans-unit.note: This option will probably go away, as any bugs with the Image Server get ironed out. This has to do with how Bloom works internally; the I.S. makes it work better on slow computers.
trans-unit.target: Use el servidor de ilustraciones para reducir el uso de memoria con ilustraciones de gran tamaño.

trans-unit.source: Bloom is switching the default font for "{0}" to the new "Andika New Basic".
trans-unit.target: Bloom está cambiando la fuente predeterminada para "{0}" a la nueva fuente "Andika New Basic".

trans-unit.source: This will improve the printed output for most languages. If your language is one of the few that need "Andika", you can switch it back in Settings:Book Making.
trans-unit.target: Esto mejorará el resultado impreso para la mayoría de los idiomas. Si su idioma es uno de los pocos que necesitan "Andika", puede cambiar de nuevo en Configuración: Haciendo libros.

trans-unit.note: {0} is a language name.
Name of a Front/Back Matter Pack that puts credits on the inside of the front cover
Name of the default Front/Back Matter Pack
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Vernacular Language', but in a source collection, Vernacular has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Language 2 (e.g. National Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Language 3 (e.g. Regional Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
If there is no third language specified, the link changes to this.
If you make certain changes in the settings dialog, the OK button changes to this.

trans-unit.source: Bloom will close and re-open this project with the new settings.
trans-unit.target: Bloom se cierre y vuelva a abrir este proyecto con la nueva configuración.
Crear una plantilla de libro para BloomPack...

trans-unit.source: Your system administrator manages Bloom updates for this computer.
trans-unit.target: Your system administrator manages Bloom updates for this computer.

trans-unit.source: Get more source books at BloomLibrary.org
trans-unit.note: Shown at the bottom of the list of books. User can click on it and it will attempt to open a browser to show the Bloom Library
trans-unit.target: Conseguir más libros de fuente en BloomLibrary.org

trans-unit.note: get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection

trans-unit.source: Bloom will now open this HTML document in your word processing program (normally Word or LibreOffice). You will be able to work with the text and images of this book. These programs normally don't do well with preserving the layout, so don't expect much.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ahora se abrirá este documento de HTML en su programa de procesamiento de textos (normalmente Word o LibreOffice). Usted será capaz de trabajar con el texto y las imágenes de este libro, pero estos programas normalmente no hacer demasiado bien con la preservación del diseño de la página, así que no esperes mucho.

trans-unit.source: This collection is locked, so new books cannot be added/removed.
trans-unit.target: Esta colección está bloqueada, no se puede agregar o eliminar nuevos libros.
Hacer actualizaciones de todos los libros
Hacer verificaciones de todos los libros

trans-unit.source: Because this is a source collection, Bloom isn't offering any existing shells as sources for new shells. If you want to add a language to a shell, instead you need to edit the collection containing the shell, rather than making a copy of it. Also, the Wall Calendar currently can't be used to make a new Shell.
trans-unit.target: Porque este es una colección de origen, Bloom no está ofreciendo ninguna shells existentes como orígenes de nuevas shells. Si desea agregar un idioma a una shell, en cambio es necesario editar la colección que contiene la shell, en lugar de hacer una copia de la misma. Además, el calendario de pared no se puede utilizar para crear una nueva shell.

trans-unit.source: Make a book using this source
trans-unit.target: Crear un libro con esta plantilla

trans-unit.source: Create a book in my language using this source book
trans-unit.target: Create a book in my language using this source book

trans-unit.note: Brings up the localization dialog
This is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere.
This is is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere.
Shown as the thumbnail caption when the book doesn't have a title.

trans-unit.source: Could not connect to the server to check for an update. Are you connected to the internet?
trans-unit.note: Shown when Bloom tries to check for an update but can't, for example because it can't connect to the internet, or a problems with our server, etc.
trans-unit.target: No se pudo conectar al servidor para comprobar si hay una actualización. ¿Está conectado a Internet?

trans-unit.source: Your Bloom is up to date.
Bloom is already working on checking for updates.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ya comprueba si hay actualizaciones.

trans-unit.source: A new version appears to be available, but Bloom could not install it.
trans-unit.target: Una nueva versión parece estar disponible, pero Bloom no pudo instalarlo.

trans-unit.note: Appears after Bloom has downloaded a program update in the background and is ready to switch the user to it the next time they run Bloom.

trans-unit.source: A new version of Bloom is available.
trans-unit.target: Una nueva versión de Bloom está disponible.

trans-unit.note: In a wizard, this button takes you to the previous step.
Used for the Finish button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
This is shown when Bloom is slowly loading something, so the user doesn't worry about why they don't see the result immediately.
Used for the Next button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
In a wizard, this button takes you to the next step.
Used to point the user to a web page. Put the '{0}' where the web page URL will go.

trans-unit.source: Your download ({0}) is complete. You can see it in the 'Books from BloomLibrary.org' section of your Collections.
trans-unit.target: Su descarga ({0}) es completa. Se puede ver en la sección de sus colecciones, "Libros de la Bloom Library". Si usted no parece estar en el medio de hacer algo, Bloom seleccionará por usted.

trans-unit.source: Bloom downloaded the book but had problems making it available in Bloom. Please restart your computer and try again. If you get this message again, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom developers.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ha descargado el libro, pero tuvo problemas haciéndolo disponible en Bloom. Por favor, reinicie la computadora y vuelva a intentarlo. Si recibe este mensaje de nuevo, por favor haga clic en el botón "Detalles" y reportar el problema a los programadores de Bloom

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading your book.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema al descargar su libro.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema al descargar su libro. Es posible que necesite reiniciar Bloom u obtener ayuda técnica.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading the book: something took too long. You can try again at a different time, or write to us at issues@BloomLibrary.org if you cannot get the download to work from your location.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema al descargar el libro: algo tomó demasiado tiempo. Puede volver a intentarlo en otro momento, o escríbanos a issues@bloomlibrary.org si la descarga no funciona desde su ubicación.

trans-unit.note: This is for the button that LAUNCHES the dialog, not the "Add this page" button that is IN the dialog.
This is for the button inside the dialog

trans-unit.source: Converting to this layout will cause some content to be lost.
trans-unit.target: Converting to this layout will cause some content to be lost.

trans-unit.note: Seen when the book's main template page file is missing.

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the back cover.
trans-unit.target: Si usted necesita un lugar para poner más información sobre el libro, puede utilizar esta página, que es la parte interior de la cubierta posterior.

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the outside of the back cover.
trans-unit.target: Si usted necesita un lugar para poner más información sobre el libro, puede utilizar esta página, que es la parte exterior de la cubierta posterior.

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for bilingual mode, 2 languages per page

trans-unit.source: Open the HTML used to make this PDF, in Firefox (must be on path)
trans-unit.target: Abrir el HTML utilizado para hacer este PDF, en Chrome (debe estar en camino).

trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, este libro está bloqueado para que las ilustraciones no se puedan cambiar.
¿Está seguro que quiere eliminar esta página?

trans-unit.target: You need to select some text before you can copy it

trans-unit.note: Shown between 'Picture' and 'Text' when Custom Page is in Layout mode

trans-unit.target: You need to select some text before you can cut it

trans-unit.target: Remove this page from the book

trans-unit.note: This is for the 4-button panel that pops up when the user selects more than one character in a textbox.
This is for the 4-button panel that pops up when the user selects more than one character in a textbox.
This is for the 4-button panel that pops up when the user selects more than one character in a textbox.
This is for the 4-button panel that pops up when the user selects more than one character in a textbox.

trans-unit.target: Insert a new page which is a duplicate of this one

trans-unit.target: No se puede cambiar estos porque esta no es la copia original.

trans-unit.target: This word is not decodable in this stage.

trans-unit.source: This sentence is too long for this level.
trans-unit.target: Esta frase es demasiado larga para este nivel.

trans-unit.source: This page is an experimental prototype which may have many problems, for which we apologize.
trans-unit.target: Esta página es un prototipo experimental que puede tener muchos problemas, para lo cual pedimos disculpas.

trans-unit.source: The current selected font is '{0}', but it is not installed on this computer. Some other font will be used.
trans-unit.target: La fuente seleccionada es '{0}', pero no está instalado en este computadora. Otra fuente se utiliza.

trans-unit.target: Ya existe ese estilo. Por favor elija otro nombre.

trans-unit.target: Cambiar el espaciado entre líneas de texto

trans-unit.source: Please use only alphabetical characters. Numbers at the end are ok, as in "part2".
trans-unit.target: Por favor, use sólo caracteres alfabéticos. Los números al final están bien, como en "part2".

trans-unit.source: Reset this style to default settings
trans-unit.target: Reset this style to default settings
Cambiar el espacio entre las palabras

trans-unit.source: You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.
trans-unit.target: You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.

trans-unit.source: When you are making an original book, use this box to record contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc.
trans-unit.target: Cuando vaya a crear un libro original, use este cuadro para registrar las contribuciones hechas por los escritores, ilustradores, editores, etc.

trans-unit.source: When you make a book from a shell, use this box to tell who did the translation.
trans-unit.target: Cuando haces un libro desde un shell, utilice este cuadro para decir quién hizo la traducción.

trans-unit.note: Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.
Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

trans-unit.target: Haga clic para editar derechos de autor & licencia

trans-unit.source: Use this to acknowledge any funding agencies.
trans-unit.target: Use esto para reconocer los organismos de financiamiento.

trans-unit.source: International Standard Book Number. Leave blank if you don't have one of these.
trans-unit.target: Número Internacional Normalizado para Libros. Dejar en blanco si no tiene uno de estos.

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the front cover.
trans-unit.target: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the front cover.

trans-unit.note: This is used to separate items in a list, such as 'Province, District, Country' on the Title Page. For English, that means comma followed by a space. Don't forget the space if your script uses them.

trans-unit.source: The contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc., in {lang}
trans-unit.target: Las contribuciones hechas por los escritores, ilustradores, editores, etc, en {lang}

trans-unit.source: Adapted from original without a copyright notice.
trans-unit.note: On the Credits page of a book being translated, Bloom shows this if the original book did not have a copyright notice.
trans-unit.target: Adaptado de una obra sin registro de derechos de autor.

trans-unit.note: On the Credits page of a book being translated, Bloom puts texts like 'Licensed under CC-BY', so that we have a record of what the license was for the original book. Put {0} in the translation, where the license should go in the sentence.

On the Credits page of a book being translated, Bloom shows the original copyright. Put {0} in the translation where the copyright notice should go. For example in English, 'Adapted from original, {0}.' comes out like 'Adapted from original, Copyright 2011 SIL'.

trans-unit.source: Simple line drawings look best. Instead of using this page, you can also make your own thumbnail.png file and set it to Read-only so Bloom doesn't write over it.
trans-unit.target: Simple line drawings look best. Instead of using this page, you can also make your own thumbnail.png file and set it to Read-only so Bloom doesn't write over it.
Haga clic para elegir el tema
Reconocimientos para la versión traducida, en {lang}

trans-unit.source: To unlock this shellbook, go into the toolbox on the right, find the gear icon, and click 'Allow changes to this shellbook'.
trans-unit.target: To unlock this shellbook, go into the toolbox on the right, find the gear icon, and click 'Allow changes to this shellbook'.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had problems using your computer's clipboard. Some other program may be interfering.
trans-unit.target: Bloom had problems using your computer's clipboard. Some other program may be interfering.

trans-unit.source: Edit Image Credits, Copyright, and License
trans-unit.target: Editar créditos de imagen, derechos de autor, y Licencia

trans-unit.source: Try closing other programs and restart your computer if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Try closing other programs and restart your computer if necessary.

trans-unit.source: Feel free to modify or delete this page.
trans-unit.target: Feel free to modify or delete this page.

trans-unit.source:
The file you’ve chosen is a “JPEG” file. JPEG files are perfect for photographs and color artwork. However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art. Problems include:
• Fuzziness and grey dots.
• Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
• If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.

Note: Because JPEG is “lossy”, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse. If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

Please select from one of the following, then click “OK”:
trans-unit.target:
El archivo elegido es un archivo "JPEG". Ilustraciones JPEG son perfectas para las fotografías y las ilustraciones en color. Sin embargo, JPEG es un gran problema para arte de línea en blanco y negro. Los problemas incluyen: 
• Borrosidad y puntos grises. 
• Archivos de gran tamaño, esto hace un libro difícil a compartir. 
• Si hay muchos archivos JPEG de gran tamaño, Bloom no tiene suficiente memoria para hacer PDFs 
 
 Nota: Debido a JPEG es "lossy", la conversión de un archivo JPEG a PNG, TIFF o BMP en realidad hace que las cosas aún peor. Si esta es arte de línea en blanco y negro, debe obtener un archivo original escaneado en uno de esos formatos 

 Por favor seleccione uno de los siguientes, a continuación, haga clic en "Aceptar":

trans-unit.source: This option is only available in the Publish tab.
trans-unit.target: Esta opción sólo está disponible en la pestaña publicar.

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for monolingual mode, one language per page
Default file and folder name when you make a new book, but haven't give it a title yet.

trans-unit.source: Before you can paste an image, copy one onto your 'clipboard', from another program.
trans-unit.target: Antes de que usted pueda pegar una ilustración, copiar uno de otro programa en su "portapapeles".

trans-unit.source: There are no other layout options for this template.
trans-unit.note: Show in the layout chooser dropdown of the edit tab, if there was only a single layout choice
trans-unit.target: No hay otras opciones de diseño para esta plantilla.

trans-unit.source: This box has more text than will fit
trans-unit.target: This box has more text than will fit

trans-unit.source: A container on this page is overflowing
trans-unit.note: This shows up in pages like the cover where sizing is very flexible. No one thing is too big, but not everything on the page will fit. To see it, put a lot of text on a cover page, until a red bar appears at the bottom; then hover over the bar.
trans-unit.target: A container on this page is overflowing

trans-unit.source: That change is not allowed. Front matter and back matter pages must remain where they are.
trans-unit.target: No se permite ese cambio. Páginas del material inicial y final deben permanecer donde están

trans-unit.source: Choose a page size and orientation
trans-unit.target: Elija un tamaño de página y orientación

trans-unit.target: There is nothing on the Clipboard that you can paste here.

trans-unit.target: No se puede poner nada allí mientras usted está haciendo un libro original.
Cambiar el borde y el fondo

Cambiar el espacio entre las palabras

trans-unit.note: This is the label of a tab in the text properties dialog that appears when you click a cog icon in a text box while changing the layout of a page

trans-unit.source: Include the name of the language using {lang}. For example: "Enter color in {lang}".
trans-unit.note: Becomes visible when "Show on each" option is chosen in combo. Do NOT translate {lang}.
trans-unit.target: Include the name of the language using {lang}. For example: "Enter color in {lang}".

trans-unit.source: "Normal" will show local language, and potentially regional or national, depending on the multilingual settings of the book. Use this for most content.
trans-unit.target: "Normal" will show local language, and potentially regional or national, depending on the multilingual settings of the book. Use this for most content.

trans-unit.source: Use one of these for simple text boxes that are always in only one language.
trans-unit.target: Use one of these for simple text boxes that are always in only one language.

trans-unit.target: What should authors put in this box?

trans-unit.note: Label above pull-down menu with options, ShowOnGroup/ShowOnEach

trans-unit.target: Just once on the whole group

trans-unit.target: On each language-field in the group

trans-unit.note: Label above the set of options, Top/Center/Bottom

Used to create string "Level # of #". The spaces on each side of this word are added programmatically.

trans-unit.source: When you click "Add Page", you can choose from pages contained in template books. To make this a template book, tick this checkbox.
trans-unit.target: When you click "Add Page", you can choose from pages contained in template books. To make this a template book, tick this checkbox.

trans-unit.source: Bloom normally prevents most changes to shellbooks. If you need to add pages, change images, etc., tick the box below.
trans-unit.target: Bloom normally prevents most changes to shellbooks. If you need to add pages, change images, etc., tick the box below.

trans-unit.source: Bloom recording is in an unusual state, possibly caused by unplugging a microphone. You will need to restart.
trans-unit.note: This is very low priority for translation.
trans-unit.target: Bloom recording is in an unusual state, possibly caused by unplugging a microphone. You will need to restart.

trans-unit.source: This computer appears to have no sound recording device available. You will need one to record audio for a talking book.
trans-unit.target: This computer appears to have no sound recording device available. You will need one to record audio for a talking book.

trans-unit.source: Please hold the button down until you have finished recording
trans-unit.note: Appears when the speak/record button is pressed very briefly
trans-unit.target: Please hold the button down until you have finished recording

trans-unit.source: 1) Check that you are recording into the correct device and that these levels are showing blue:
trans-unit.target: 1) Averiguar que está usando el dispositivo de grabación correcto y que el nivel de sonido aparece en la zona azul:

trans-unit.source: Make an e-book that can play recordings while highlighting sentences.
trans-unit.target: Hacer un e-book que pueda reproducir las grabaciones y al mismo tiempo destacar el texto correspondiente.

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for trilingual mode, 3 languages per page

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.
trans-unit.target: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong. Consider using the 'Report a Problem' command under the 'Help' menu.
trans-unit.target: Bloom tuvo un problema mostrando este libro. Esto no significa que su trabajo se perdió, pero sí significa que algo no está actualizado, no se encuentra, o se ha hecho mal. Considere el uso del comando 'reportar un problema' en el menú "Ayuda".

trans-unit.note: displays as a "toast", {0} is the URL/filename

trans-unit.source: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Your computer denied Bloom access to the book. You may need technical help in setting the operating system permissions for this file.
trans-unit.target: Your computer denied Bloom access to the book. You may need technical help in setting the operating system permissions for this file.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.

trans-unit.source: {0} requires a newer version of Bloom. Download the latest version of Bloom from {1}.
trans-unit.note: {0} will get the name of the book, {1} will give a link to open the Bloom Library Web page.
trans-unit.target: {0} requires a newer version of Bloom. Download the latest version of Bloom from {1}.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem deleting this file: {0}
trans-unit.target: Bloom had a problem deleting this file: {0}

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem importing this picture.
trans-unit.target: Bloom tuvo un problema al importar esta imagen.

trans-unit.source: Report this problem to Bloom Support
trans-unit.target: Report this problem to Bloom Support

trans-unit.source: This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer. You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or change the book's Front/Back Matter pack setting.
trans-unit.target: This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer. You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or change the book's Front/Back Matter pack setting.

trans-unit.source: This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer. You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or go to Settings:Book Making and change to another Front/Back Matter Pack.
trans-unit.target: Este libro utiliza el paquete de materia frontal/posterior nombrado '{0}', pero Bloom no pudo encontrarlo en esta computadora. Puede instalar un BloomPack que le dará '{0}', o ir a Configuración: Haciendo Libros y cambiar a otro paquete de materia frontal/posterior.

trans-unit.note: This shows in the 'toast' that pops up to notify the user of a non-fatal problem.

trans-unit.source: This book called for a Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but this version of Bloom does not have it, and Bloom could not find it on this computer. The book has been changed to use the Front/Back Matter pages from the Collection Settings.
trans-unit.target: This book called for a Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but this version of Bloom does not have it, and Bloom could not find it on this computer. The book has been changed to use the Front/Back Matter pages from the Collection Settings.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.

trans-unit.source: A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.
trans-unit.target: A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.

trans-unit.note: Appears in progress indicator

trans-unit.source: This script is right to left
trans-unit.target: This script is right to left

trans-unit.source: I accept the terms of the license agreement
trans-unit.target: Acepto las condiciones del acuerdo de licencia

trans-unit.source: I agree to the Bloom Library's Terms of Use
trans-unit.target: Estoy de acuerdo con los términos de uso de la Bloom Library

trans-unit.source: There is already a collection with that name, at {0}.\nPlease pick a unique name.
trans-unit.target: Ya hay una colección con ese nombre, en {0}.\nPor favor elija un nombre único.

trans-unit.source: Choose the Main Language For This Collection
trans-unit.target: Elija el idioma principal para esta colección
Ejemplos: "Libros de salud", "Historias de animales de PNG"

trans-unit.source: What would you like to call this collection?
trans-unit.target: ¿Qué te gustaría denomino a esta colección?
Problema con el nombre de la colección

trans-unit.source: OK, that's all we need to get started with your new '{0}' collection.\nClick on the 'Finish' button.
trans-unit.note: {0} is the name of the new collection
trans-unit.target: OK, that's all we need to get started with your new '{0}' collection.\nClick on the 'Finish' button.

trans-unit.source: If you already have a collection you want to open, click the 'Cancel' button.
trans-unit.target: Si usted ya tiene una colección que desea abrir, haga clic en el botón "Cancelar".

trans-unit.source: A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make vernacular books with your shells.
trans-unit.target: Una colección de armazón o plantilla de libros en uno o más idiomas de comunicación más amplia. De esto, usted puede hacer una BloomPack para dar a otros para que hagan libros vernáculos.

trans-unit.source: A collection of books in a local language.
trans-unit.target: Una colección de libros en el idioma local

trans-unit.source: These are optional. Bloom will place them in the right places on title page of books you create.
trans-unit.target: Estos son opcionales. Bloom colocarlos en los lugares correctos en la página del título del libro que cree.

trans-unit.note: The {0} is replaced by the name of the language.

trans-unit.source: Unable to create a new collection using that name.
trans-unit.target: No se puede crear una nueva colección con ese nombre.

trans-unit.source: You are almost ready to start making books.
trans-unit.target: Está casi listo para empezar a crear libros.

trans-unit.source: In order to keep things simple and organized, Bloom keeps all the books you make in one or more Collections. The first thing we need to do is make one for you.
trans-unit.target: A fin de mantener un proyecto que es simple y organizada, Bloom mantiene todos los libros que realice en una o más <i>Colecciones</ i>. Así que lo primero que debemos hacer es crear un libro.

trans-unit.source: Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ha detectado que esta colección se encuentra en una carpeta de Dropbox. Esto puede causar problemas porque Dropbox a veces bloquea Bloom de sus propios archivos. Si tiene problemas, le recomendamos que mueva su colección a otro lugar o desactivar Dropbox durante el uso de Bloom.

trans-unit.source: This collection is part of your 'Sources for new books' which you can see in the bottom left of the Collections tab. It cannot be opened for editing.
trans-unit.target: Esta colección forma parte de sus "orígenes de nuevos libros" que se puede ver en la parte inferior izquierda de la pestaña Colecciones. No se puede abrir para su edición.

trans-unit.note: This shows in the file-open dialog that you use to open a different bloom collection

trans-unit.source: Browse for another collection on this computer
trans-unit.target: Busque otra colección en esta computadora

trans-unit.source: Copy From Chorus Hub on Local Network
trans-unit.target: Copia desde Chorus Hub en la red local

trans-unit.note: This opens the Chorus Help to learn more about send/receive.

trans-unit.source: Has someone else used Send/Receive to share a collection with you?\nUse one of these red buttons to copy their collection to your computer.\nLater, use Send/Receive to share your work back with them.
trans-unit.target: ¿Ha utilizado alguien el "Enviar/Recibir" para compartir una colección con usted?\nUtilice uno de estos botones rojos para copiar su colección a su computadora.\nDespués, utilice Enviar/Recibir para compartir su trabajo con ellos.

trans-unit.source: Pages can not be re-ordered when you are translating a book.
trans-unit.target: Las páginas no pueden ser reordenadas cuando está traduciendo un libro

trans-unit.note: dialog title for license agreement

trans-unit.source: Please install Adobe Reader so that Bloom can show your completed book. Until then, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Por favor instale a Adobe Reader para que Bloom pueda mostrar su libro. Hasta entonces, puede guardar el libro PDF y abrirlo en otro programa.

trans-unit.source: That's strange... Adobe Reader gave an error when trying to show that PDF. You can still try saving the PDF Book.
trans-unit.target: Eso es extraño... Adobe Reader le dio un error al intentar mostrar ese PDF. Todavía puede intentar salvar el libro PDF.

trans-unit.source: Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Noticia triste. Bloom no fue capaz de abrir Adobe Reader aquí, así que Bloom no puede mostrar su libro.\nPor favor, desinstale la versión existente de 'Adobe Reader' y vuelva a instalar a 'Adobe Reader'.\nHasta que llegue ese fijo, puede guardar el libro PDF y abrirlo en otro programa.

trans-unit.source: Make a booklet from the inside pages of the book. Pages will be laid out and reordered so that when you fold it, you'll have a booklet.\n
trans-unit.target: Hacer un folleto de las páginas interiores del libro. Las páginas se distribuido y reordenado de manera que cuando la doblará , tendrá un folleto

trans-unit.source: Upload to BloomLibrary.org, where others can download and localize into their own language.
trans-unit.target: Cargar a BloomLibrary.org, donde otros pueden descargar y localizar a su propia lengua.

trans-unit.source: Make a PDF of just the front and back (both sides), so you can print on colored paper.
trans-unit.target: Hacer un PDF de sólo la anverso y reverso (ambos lados), para que pueda imprimir en papel de color.

trans-unit.source: Make an ePUB (electronic book) out of this book, allowing it to be read on various electronic reading devices.
trans-unit.target: Make an ePUB (electronic book) out of this book, allowing it to be read on various electronic reading devices.

trans-unit.note: This is the title of a dialog about exporting a Bloom book to the InDesign XML format
The parenthesized word indicates the negative effect of using this option. This text is for a menu item.

trans-unit.source: This PDF viewer can be improved by installing the free Adobe Reader on this computer.
trans-unit.target: This PDF viewer can be improved by installing the free Adobe Reader on this computer.

trans-unit.note: Instead of making a booklet, just make normal pages

trans-unit.source: Make a PDF of every page of the book, one page per piece of paper.
trans-unit.target: Hacer un PDF de cada página del libro, una página por hoja de papel.

trans-unit.note: menu header in the Publish tab
Header for a region of the menu which lists various standard page layout sizes

trans-unit.source: Open the PDF in the default system PDF viewer
trans-unit.target: Abra el PDF en el visor predeterminado de archivos PDF

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem making a PDF of this book. You may need technical help or to contact the developers. But here are some things you can try:
trans-unit.target: Bloom tenía un problema al realizar un PDF de este libro. Tal vez necesite ayuda técnica o si necesita contactar los desarrolladores. Pero aquí hay algunas cosas que puede probar:

trans-unit.note: Message displayed in a progress report dialog box

trans-unit.source: Compressing PDF & Converting Color to CMYK
trans-unit.note: Message displayed in a progress report dialog box
trans-unit.target: Compressing PDF & Converting Color to CMYK

trans-unit.note: Message displayed in a progress report dialog box
displayed as file type for Save File dialog. Don't use vertical bar (|) in this string!

trans-unit.source: Error creating, compressing, or recoloring the PDF file
trans-unit.note: Message briefly displayed to the user in a toast
trans-unit.target: Error creating, compressing, or recoloring the PDF file

trans-unit.note: Message displayed in a progress report dialog box
Message displayed in a progress report dialog box, a partial step of "Creating PDF"
Message displayed in a progress report dialog box, {0} is replaced by the page number

trans-unit.source: PDF for Printshop (CMYK - U.S. Web Coated (SWOP) v2)
trans-unit.note: displayed as file type for Save File dialog, the content in parentheses may not be translatable. Don't use vertical bar (|) in this string!
trans-unit.target: PDF for Printshop (CMYK - U.S. Web Coated (SWOP) v2)

trans-unit.source: Try doing this on a computer with more memory
trans-unit.target: Trate de hacer esto en una computadora con más memoria

trans-unit.source: Restart your computer and try this again right away
trans-unit.target: Reiniciar la computadora e inténtelo de nuevo

trans-unit.source: Replace large, high-resolution images in your document with lower-resolution ones
trans-unit.target: Sustituya imágenes grandes y de alta resolución en el documento con los de resolución más baja

trans-unit.note: title for the message box

trans-unit.source: The PDF file has not been saved because you chose not to allow producing a "PDF for Printshop".
trans-unit.note: explanation that file was not saved displayed in a message box
trans-unit.target: The PDF file has not been saved because you chose not to allow producing a "PDF for Printshop".

trans-unit.source: Bloom uses Adobe color profiles to convert PDF files from using RGB color to using CMYK color. This is part of preparing a "PDF for Printshop". You must agree to the following license in order to perform this task in Bloom.
trans-unit.note: Brief explanation of what this license is and why the user needs to agree to it
trans-unit.target: Bloom uses Adobe color profiles to convert PDF files from using RGB color to using CMYK color. This is part of preparing a "PDF for Printshop". You must agree to the following license in order to perform this task in Bloom.

trans-unit.source: All rights reserved (Contact the Copyright holder for any permissions.)
trans-unit.target: Todos los derechos reservados (contacto el titular del Copyright para los permisos

trans-unit.source: BloomLibrary.org already has a previous version of this book from you. If you upload it again, it will be replaced with your current version.
trans-unit.target: BloomLibrary.org ya tiene una versión anterior de este libro. Si lo subes otra vez, se sustituirá con su versión actual.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was a problem uploading {0}. Some details follow. You may need technical help.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, hubo un problema cargando {0}. Siguen algunos detalles. Puede que necesites ayuda técnica.

trans-unit.source: One or more fields above need your attention before uploading.
trans-unit.target: Uno o más campos anteriores necesitan su atención antes de cargar

trans-unit.source: Sorry, "{0}" was not successfully uploaded. Sometimes this is caused by temporary problems with the servers we use. It's worth trying again in an hour or two. If you regularly get this problem please report it to us.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, "{0}" se ha subido correctamente

trans-unit.source: By uploading, you confirm your agreement with the Bloom Library Terms of Use and grant the rights it describes.
trans-unit.target: Al cargar, usted confirma su acuerdo con los términos de uso de la Bloom Library y concede los derechos que describe

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema cargando su libro.

trans-unit.note: This is added after the language name, in order to indicate that some parts of the book have not been translated into this language yet.

trans-unit.source: We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
trans-unit.target: No podemos crear una nueva cuenta con esa dirección, porque ya tenemos una cuenta con esa dirección de correo electrónico. Le gustaría hacer login?

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to verify your login. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom no pudo conectar al servidor para verificar tu nombre de usuario. Por favor, compruebe su conexión de red.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to complete your login or signup. This could be a problem with your internet connection, our server, or some equipment in between.
trans-unit.target: Bloom no pudo conectar al servidor para completar su login o suscripción. Esto podría ser un problema con la conexión a internet, nuestro servidor o algún equipo en el medio.

trans-unit.source: In order to sign up for a BloomLibrary.org account, you must check the box indicating that you agree to the BloomLibrary Terms of Use.
trans-unit.target: Con el fin de registrarse para una cuenta de BloomLibrary.org, debe marcar la casilla indicando que de acuerdo a los términos de uso de BloomLibrary.

trans-unit.source: We don't have a user on record with that email. Would you like to sign up?
trans-unit.target: No tenemos un usuario registrado con ese email. ¿Le gustaría registrarse?

trans-unit.source: Password and user ID did not match
trans-unit.target: Contraseña y nombre de usuario no coincide

trans-unit.source: Please agree to terms of use
trans-unit.target: Por favor, de acuerdo a los términos de uso

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid email address. We will send an email to this address so you can reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Introduzca una dirección de correo electrónico válida. Le enviaremos un correo electrónico a esta dirección para que pueda restablecer su contraseña.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to reset your password. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom no pudo conectar al servidor para restablecer la contraseña. Por favor, compruebe su conexión de red.

trans-unit.source: We are sending an email to {0} with instructions for how to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Estamos enviando un correo electrónico a {0} con instrucciones para restablecer la contraseña

trans-unit.source:
This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.
Do you want to go ahead?
trans-unit.target:
This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.
Do you want to go ahead?

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not log in to BloomLibrary.org using your saved credentials. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom no podo entrar a BloomLibrary.org utilizando las credenciales guardadas. Por favor, compruebe su conexión de red.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this version of Bloom Desktop is not compatible with the current version of BloomLibrary.org. Please upgrade to a newer version.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, esta versión de escritorio de Bloom no es compatible con la versión actual de BloomLibrary.org. Por favor actualice a una versión más reciente.

trans-unit.source: Please log in to BloomLibrary.org (or sign up) before uploading
trans-unit.target: Por favor, Inicia sesión para BloomLibrary.org (o registrarse) antes de cargar

trans-unit.source: Please set this from the edit tab
trans-unit.note: This shows next to the license, if the license has not yet been set.
trans-unit.target: Configure esto desde la pestaña Editar

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Assigning a Creative Commons License makes it easy for you to clearly grant certain permissions to everyone.
trans-unit.target: Sugerencia: Asignar una licencia Creative Commons facilita para que usted pueda conceder claramente determinados permisos a todo el mundo.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.
trans-unit.target: Sugerencia: Las licencias Creative Commons hacen que sea mucho más fácil para que otros utilicen su libro, incluso si no tienen fluidez en el idioma de su licencia personalizada.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book. This is probably because your computer is set to use the wrong timezone or your system time is badly wrong. See http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html for how to fix this.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema cargando su libro. Probablemente su equipo está configurado para utilizar una zona horaria equivocada o la hora del sistema es incorrecta. Ver http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html para ver cómo solucionar este problema.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, "{0}" is now available on BloomLibrary.org ({1})
trans-unit.target: Felicidades, "{0}" ya está disponible en BloomLibrary.org ({1})

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema cargando su libro. Es posible que necesite reiniciar Bloom o conseguir ayuda técnica.

trans-unit.note: In this step, Bloom is uploading things like title, languages, and topic tags to the BloomLibrary.org database.

trans-unit.source: Please add texts to the Sample Texts folder.
trans-unit.target: Please add texts to the Sample Texts folder.

trans-unit.source: Click on letters to add them to this stage.
trans-unit.target: Haga clic en las letras para añadirlos a esta etapa.

trans-unit.source: E.g. "ai oo sh ng th ing"
trans-unit.target: E.g. "ai oo sh ng th ing"
No se puede leer este formato

trans-unit.source: Help exporting and converting files to use as sample texts
trans-unit.target: Ayuda para la exportación y la conversión de los archivos que se utilizará como textos modelos

trans-unit.source: List letters and word-forming characters in alphabetic order.
trans-unit.target: List letters and word-forming characters in alphabetic order.

trans-unit.source: To help you make decodable readers, Bloom needs to know the letters and letter combinations that you will be teaching.
trans-unit.target: Para ayudarle a crear lectores decodificables, Bloom debe saber las letras y combinaciones de letras que usted va a enseñar.

trans-unit.source: Separate each letter or letter combination with a space. For example, here is what we might use for the English language:
trans-unit.target: Separe cada letra o combinación de letras con un espacio. Por ejemplo, aquí es lo que podríamos utilizar para el idioma inglés:

trans-unit.source: Notice that the English list includes symbols that are used to make words, like ' in
trans-unit.target: Observe que la lista inglés incluye símbolos que se utilizan para crear palabras, como ' en

trans-unit.source: Maximum Average Length of Sentences in Book
trans-unit.target: Maximum Average Length of Sentences in Book
Cantidad máxima de palabras únicas por libro

trans-unit.source: Open the sample texts folder for this language.
trans-unit.target: Open the sample texts folder for this language.
Cantidad máxima de palabras en cada página
, el motor de búsqueda de la alfabetización

trans-unit.source: Bloom already knows which characters in the world's languages always mark the end of sentences. To add others, enter the Unicode character escapes here. For example for Thai script languages, enter \U0020 to tell Bloom that normal spaces are used to break sentences.
trans-unit.target: Bloom already knows which characters in the world's languages always mark the end of sentences. To add others, enter the Unicode character escapes here. For example for Thai script languages, enter \U0020 to tell Bloom that normal spaces are used to break sentences.
Configurar la herramienta de lectores decodificables
Configurar la herramienta de lectores nivelados

trans-unit.source: set up the alphabet for this language.
trans-unit.target: configurar el alfabeto para este nivel:

trans-unit.source: Things to remember for this level:
trans-unit.target: Cosas para recordar para este nivel:

trans-unit.source: To help you make decodable readers, Bloom can suggest words that fit within the current stage. There are two ways to give words to Bloom:
trans-unit.target: Para ayudarle a crear lectores decodificables, Bloom puede sugerir palabras que caben dentro de la etapa actual. Hay dos maneras de introducir palabras para Bloom:
2) Coloque los archivos de texto en su

trans-unit.source: We are using lists of allowed words to define stages
trans-unit.target: We are using lists of allowed words to define stages

trans-unit.source: We are using letters with sight words to define stages
trans-unit.target: We are using letters with sight words to define stages

trans-unit.source: In addition, this Bloom Pack will carry your latest decodable and leveled reader settings for the \"{0}\" language. Anyone opening this Bloom Pack, who then opens a \"{0}\" collection, will have their current decodable and leveled reader settings replaced by the settings in this Bloom Pack. They will also get the current set of words for use in decodable readers.
trans-unit.target: Además, este BloomPack llevará su última configuración para lectores decodificables y nivelado para el idioma \"{0}\". Cualquiera que abre este BloomPack, que entonces se abre una colección en el idioma \"{0}\", tendrá su configuración actual para lectores decodificables y nivelado reemplazados por la configuración de este BloomPack. También recibirán el conjunto actual de palabras para su uso en lectores decodificables.

trans-unit.source: The following books will be made into templates:
trans-unit.target: Los siguientes libros se harán en las plantillas:

trans-unit.source: Please take a minute to register {0}
trans-unit.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.
trans-unit.target: Por favor tome un momento para registrar {0}

trans-unit.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.

trans-unit.source: I'm stuck, I'll finish this later.
trans-unit.target: Estoy atascado, voy a terminar esto más tarde.

trans-unit.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.
Shown in the button that closes the dialog after a successful report submission.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to submit your report directly to our server. Please retry or email {0} to {1}.
trans-unit.target: Bloom no pudo enviar su informe directamente a nuestro servidor. Vuelva a intentarlo o enviar un correo electrónico {0} a {1}.

trans-unit.note: Shown if there was an error submitting the report. Lets the user try submitting it again.

trans-unit.source: See what else will be submitted

trans-unit.note: This is shown while Bloom is sending the problem report to our server.

trans-unit.source: We received your report, thanks for taking the time to help make Bloom better!
trans-unit.target: Hemos recibido su informe. Gracias por tomarse el tiempo para ayudar a mejorar Bloom!

trans-unit.source: What seems to be the problem?

trans-unit.note: This is shown while Bloom is creating the problem report. It's generally too fast to see, unless you include a large book.
trans-unit.target: Creando un archivo zip del libro...

trans-unit.source: I get it. Do not show this again.
trans-unit.target: Entiendo. No mostrar este mensaje de nuevo.

trans-unit.source: Please notice the sample printer settings below. Use them as a guide while you set up the printer.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta los valores de la impresora muestra abajo. Utilizarlos como una guía mientras configura la impresora.

trans-unit.source: A blank page that allows you to add items.
trans-unit.target: Una página en blanco que le permite agregar elementos.

trans-unit.source: This page was automatically inserted because the following page is marked as part of a two page spread.
trans-unit.target: This page was automatically inserted because the following page is marked as part of a two page spread.

trans-unit.source: Page with a picture on top and a large, centered word below.
trans-unit.target: Página con una imagen en la parte superior y una palabra grande, centrada debajo

trans-unit.note: This label indicates a page with one arithmetic problem on it.
This label indicates a page with two arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with three arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with four arithmetic problems on it.
Caption of 2nd page in books made from Template Starter
Caption of first page in books made from Template Starter

trans-unit.target: Esta página se ha dejado en blanco intencionalmente
